discover.instruction: Read about what happened yesterday. Notice the verb forms.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай о том, что произошло вчера. Обрати внимание на формы глаголов.

content.text: Yesterday at 8 PM, I <highlight>was watching</highlight> TV. My sister <highlight>was cooking</highlight> dinner. My brother <highlight>was playing</highlight> video games. While we <highlight>were relaxing</highlight>, the doorbell rang. When I <highlight>was walking</highlight> to the door, I heard a strange noise. I opened the door and my friend <highlight>was standing</highlight> there with a surprise gift! At that moment, my mom <highlight>was talking</highlight> on the phone.
content.question: What's the difference between 'I watched' and 'I was watching'?
content.question_ru: В чём разница между 'I watched' и 'I was watching'?

theory.title: Past Continuous - Actions in progress in the past
theory.title_ru: Past Continuous - Действия в процессе в прошлом

points.example: I was working. They were sleeping.

points.rule: Use 1: Action in progress at a specific time in the past
points.rule_ru: Использование 1: Действие в процессе в конкретный момент в прошлом
points.example: At 8 PM, I was watching TV.

points.rule: Use 2: Background action when something else happened
points.rule_ru: Использование 2: Фоновое действие, когда произошло что-то другое
points.example: I was walking when it started to rain.

points.rule: Use 3: Two actions happening at the same time
points.example: While I was cooking, she was cleaning.
I was sleeping. They were sleeping.

comparison_table.example: I was watching a movie (at 9 PM).
I was watching when she called.

notice.instruction: Find all Past Continuous verbs. Is it a background action or main action?
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все глаголы в Past Continuous. Это фоновое или основное действие?

tasks.text: Last night was crazy! I was sleeping peacefully when suddenly I heard a loud noise. I woke up immediately. My cat was running around the house. She was chasing something. I was looking for my phone to use as a flashlight when the lights went off. Everything was happening so fast! While I was trying to find my cat, I tripped over a chair. Finally, I found her - she was playing with a mouse!

notice.reflection_question: In 'I was watching TV when she called', which is longer - 'watching' or 'called'?
notice.reflection_question_ru: В 'I was watching TV when she called', какое действие длиннее - 'watching' или 'called'?

sentences.sentence: I ___ (walk) home when it started to rain.
We ___ (have) dinner when the phone rang.

exercises.instruction: Choose Past Simple or Past Continuous.

questions.explanation: Two parallel actions = both Past Continuous
At a specific time = Past Continuous

questions.sentence: I ___ home when I ___ an old friend.
questions.explanation: Long action (walking) interrupted by short action (met)
Completed action with duration = Past Simple

sentences.incorrect: She was watch TV when I called.
sentences.correct: She was watching TV when I called.

sentences.incorrect: While I was cooking, the phone was rang.
sentences.correct: While I was cooking, the phone rang.

produce.instruction: Describe what was happening at a specific moment in the past.
produce.instruction_ru: Опиши, что происходило в конкретный момент в прошлом.
prompts: What were you doing at 8 PM yesterday?
What happened while you were doing something?
Describe a moment when something interrupted you
Describe what different people were doing at the same time
produce.example: Yesterday at 8 PM, I was watching a movie with my family. My brother was eating popcorn. My mom was texting on her phone. While we were watching, someone knocked on the door. I was getting up to answer when my dad came home. He was carrying pizza! We were all so happy!

texts.title: The Power Outage
texts.content: Last night, everything was going normally. I was working on my computer. My wife was reading a book. Our children were sleeping. Suddenly, all the lights went off! It was a power outage. I was looking for candles when my phone rang. My neighbor was calling. He was asking if our power was out too. We were all sitting in the dark for an hour.

texts.title: Witness Statement
texts.content: Officer, this is what I saw. At 3 PM, I was walking down Main Street. A man was running very fast. He was carrying a bag. A woman was shouting 'Stop!' Behind him, two police officers were chasing him. While all this was happening, I was standing at the bus stop. I wasn't doing anything suspicious!

texts.title: Surprise Party
texts.content: We were planning a surprise party for mom. Dad was keeping her busy. My sister was decorating the house. I was making a cake. The guests were hiding in different rooms. Everyone was waiting quietly. When mom opened the door, we were all holding our breath. She was not expecting anything! We shouted 'Surprise!' while she was taking off her coat.

texts.title: The Accident
texts.content: I saw the accident. A car was driving too fast. The traffic light was changing to red. A cyclist was crossing the street. The driver wasn't paying attention. He was looking at his phone! While the cyclist was crossing, the car hit him. Luckily, the cyclist was wearing a helmet. People were running to help immediately.

texts.title: Morning Routine
texts.content: At 7 AM this morning, everyone in my house was busy. My dad was taking a shower. My mom was making breakfast. My sister was brushing her teeth. I was getting dressed. The dog was barking at the mailman. While we were all rushing around, my phone alarm was still ringing. Nobody was listening to it!
